content:
Craft an item of type: sandstone_slab
inventory=[{"type": "diorite", "quantity": 8, "index": 10}, {"type": "magenta_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "emerald_block", "quantity": 23, "index": 13}, {"type": "crimson_fungus", "quantity": 40, "index": 23}, {"type": "sponge", "quantity": 12, "index": 24}, {"type": "magenta_carpet", "quantity": 17, "index": 25}, {"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 31, "index": 26}, {"type": "chiseled_sandstone", "quantity": 2, "index": 28}, {"type": "sand", "quantity": 4, "index": 29}, {"type": "brewing_stand", "quantity": 35, "index": 41}]

thought: To solve this task I need to craft sandstone_slab. Sandstone_slab requires placing 3 sandstone or chiseled_sandstone side by side in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to move the sand from slot 29 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 29 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: sandstone_slab
inventory=[{"type": "sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 8, "index": 10}, {"type": "magenta_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "emerald_block", "quantity": 23, "index": 13}, {"type": "crimson_fungus", "quantity": 40, "index": 23}, {"type": "sponge", "quantity": 12, "index": 24}, {"type": "magenta_carpet", "quantity": 17, "index": 25}, {"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 31, "index": 26}, {"type": "chiseled_sandstone", "quantity": 2, "index": 28}, {"type": "sand", "quantity": 3, "index": 29}, {"type": "brewing_stand", "quantity": 35, "index": 41}]
thought: Since the sand has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move the sand to the right of it. Slot 2 is to the right of slot 1, and therefore I will move the sand to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 29 to slot 2 with quantity 1

thought: Since the sand has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move the sand below it. Slot 4 is below slot 1, and therefore I will move the sand to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 29 to slot 4 with quantity 1

thought: To craft sandstone_slab, I need to place three sandstones horizontally in the crafting grid. I will start by moving the sandstone at slot 12 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 28 to slot 2 with quantity 1

thought: The third item needed to craft sandstone_slab is another chiseled_sandstone. I will move the chiseled_sandstone at slot 28 to slot 3, which is to the right of the chiseled_sandstone at slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 28 to slot 3 with quantity 1

Ok
